attributes.title: mrs nunya business
attributes.review: horrible app, never in my life has an app gave me a JUMPSCARE 😨 im absolutely horrified and i was trembling with tears. Also is anyone else smelling a putrid smell from the app? I have NEVER been able to smell from an app but this one smells like rotting flesh with a touch of Cheeto dust 🤢🤢🤢 absolutely never in my life will I recommend this smelly poorly designed app to anyone! I MEAN ANYONE. ☠️

attributes.title: Garbage✨❤️
attributes.review: This app is truly the worst,it gave me a virus the moment i opened and now everytime I open safari the teletubbies theme song plays🙄Not only that but when I go on the app crashes and freezes your phone for about 3-4 business days. Anyways dont get this app vote the stale cheese puff out of the office goodbye.

attributes.title: What is going on 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because they told me I was gonna get a free NCT lightstick but it was a scam so don’t download this app it’s a scam you ain’t getting a free NCT lightstick :(( you just gonna se a old white man he looked like a orange ngl so just don’t download this app even if someone tells u your gonna get a free NCT lightstick 😤😤 i hate it here I was so excited 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: IF I COULD PUT A 0 STARS RATING I WOULD
attributes.review: Hello I downloaded this app because I read a review that said a lifetime supply of Cheetos would be provided, and well I put all my information in and waited by my door for hours and nothing. Not a single Cheeto arrived. I waited for 12 hours and not a single thing. 0/5 do not recommend you download this app.

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: So I downloaded this for news, and after a couple weeks my mom kept bringing me pictures of trumps face with oranges. Then I started turning orange. Weird huh. Then my hair started to turning the color of butter. All of a sudden I owned 70 mil (charli damilios amount of followers) trump 2020 flags. You wouldn’t want me to get rid of your “hard work” well then GET RID OF OTHERS YOU ORANGE BODY BUTTER HAIRED FREAK.

attributes.title: Big Fat Hot Dogs
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i wanted to download it and it is the worst app ever it says that once you download this app you will loose 3 fingers and i dont want to loose 3 fingers so i rated this a one star dont download the app please and rate it one star so other people dont loose there fingers. Thank you and have a good day.

attributes.title: This it the worst app in the whole world

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review:
This app just crashes and doesn’t work. It caused my phone to completely shut down. I don’t trust and and neither should you. It made my
Phone slow and took up too much storage not worth the download at all. Seriously it should just get deleted

attributes.title: stupid
attributes.review: This app took ten years to download and keeps turning my phone into a strobe light. Then it possessed my phone and made it jump into the fish tank in my room and electrocute my fish. I’m so disappointed with this app. I downloaded it with the hopes of lowering my IQ but I guess I’ll just have to continue being a genius.
